General.Name: Silverback Therapeutics Inc
General.Description: ARS Pharmaceuticals, Inc., a biopharmaceutical company, develops treatments for patients and parents affected by severe allergic reactions. It is developing neffy, a needle-free and low-dose intranasal epinephrine nasal spray for patients and their caregivers with type I allergic reactions, including anaphylaxis. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in San Diego, California.
General.Address: 3525 Del Mar Heights Road, San Diego, CA, United States, 92130
